name: Converting to a Boolean value using double negation
instruction:
Write a function `toBoolean` that takes one value and converts it to `boolean`.

Use: `!!`.

Example function call:
```javascript
toBoolean(1);    // true
toBoolean(0);    // false
toBoolean('');   // false
toBoolean(' ');  // true
toBoolean(true); // true
```
